name: Make it Your Own: 25 stylish projects for your home
description:
My first book!!

A design-led interiors craft book featuring 25 'how-to' projects (designed by me!) for you to make at home, for your home!

Each 'how-to' is accompanied by suggestions for how you can 'make it your own' by putting your own design stamp on the project or customising it to fit your space.

The projects in Make it Your Own range from creating gorgeous wall-hangings to making your own lampshades, always using simple techniques to striking effect.

Be inspired to explore your own style and creativity with suggestions for how to adapt each project to really make it your own. The gorgeous photography throughout shows how the projects can work with your existing décor to transform your space.

I also give tips on using eco-ethical and vintage materials, a subject close to my heart. Whatever kind of space you live in, this book is about creating beautiful handmade objects that will make it really feel like your home.

Hardcover, 160 pages
Published by: Hardie Grant Books (2013)
Size: 24.8 x 19.2 x 2.4 cm

The perfect housewarming gift or just for someone crafty in your life!

To see more images from the book visit http://aaliciablog.blogspot.co.uk/p/my-book-make-it-your-own.html

........................................

DELIVERY

All items are posted within four working days

UK:

Postage within the UK £3


INTERNATIONAL:

A Alicia delivers anywhere in the world - international postage for this item is £10

name: Hand-embroidered brooch - blue fairisle
description:
Gorgeous little brooch to update your autumn/winter wardrobe - perfect on coats, cardigans and jumpers!

Each brooch is a one-of-a-kind!

Hand-embroidered in fairtrade organic cotton yarn and backed with eco-felt.

Comes wrapped in tissue and tied with lovely vintage/repurposed ribbon - ready to give as a gift (or a gift to yourself!)

Approx. 4.5cm x 4.5cm

FREE UK delivery!

........................................

This item will be posted within five working days. If you need something in a hurry or would like to include a gift note do just get in touch at - a.alicia.accessories@googlemail.com

name: SOLD - Forest Necklace, hand-embroidered
description:
Please note, the exact necklace pictured has now sold, but you will receive a very similar version. As each necklace is hand-embroidered there will be slight variation - but that's the beauty of handmade!


This stunning statement necklace combines an embroidered panel (hand-embroidered in organic fairtrade cotton, backed with eco-felt), super-soft pom poms and glazed handmade ceramic beads, strung on soft, vintage ribbon.

A true statement piece, yet light and easy to wear - looks amazing with everything from an old t-shirt to a black dress!

Ties with a long ribbon, so you can make it just the right length for you.

Comes beautifully gift boxed!
FREE UK delivery!

........................................

All items are posted within four working days

name: Handmade Flower Explosion Medium Cushion - Natural
description:
An attention grabbing cushion, hand-embroidered with strange plant forms!

Handmade in my London studio - each embroidered cushion is unique. 
(If you would like to order a set of cushions do just get in touch!)

The front of the cushion cover is beautiful organic crossweave* cotton, hand embroidered with wool made from organic fairtrade cotton. The cover is backed with organic cotton calico (see image 3). Pillow-case style closure.

The exceedingly plump cushion pad inside is made in the UK and filled with 100% British wool.

Size: 
Medium - 35cm x 35cm

Colour: 
Front - natural (pale beige) with mixed embroidery 
Back - natural calico

A great way to brighten up your sofa or a very special gift!

*Crossweave means it is woven from two different shades giving it a truly special colour and texture.
